title: 'Wrong website pics and description'
body: The actual product that gets sent is much lower in quality than shown in the pics. Very low quality. Its not even worth half the price. Returned immediately. Not recommended. It won't last even a water spill forget about sustaining a wash. Kind of like a fraud by the seller to target customers who avoid returns and rather keep it to give a try. I have observed this is mostly the case with this BSB brand products.
